title: 03/25/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 03/25/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On today’s Dan Patrick Show, the guys open the show with the continued discussion surrounding NHL official Tim Peele, and his comment caught on a rink-side microphone that ultimately cost him his job. Shifting to the gridiron, MMQB columnist Albert Breer joins Dan in the first hour to talk about all things NFL Draft, including which teams shake things up near the top of the draft order. Lastly, Frank Isola, the man of many jobs joins the show in the final hour on the day of the trade deadline to talk about some likely landing spots for some players.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On today’s Dan Patrick Show, the guys open the show with the continued discussion surrounding NHL official Tim Peele, and his comment caught on a rink-side microphone that ultimately cost him his job. Shifting to the gridiron, MMQB columnist Albert Breer joins Dan in the first hour to talk about all things NFL Draft, including which teams shake things up near the top of the draft order. Lastly, Frank Isola, the man of many jobs joins the show in the final hour on the day of the trade deadline to talk about some likely landing spots for some players.
